name: Sepal AI
headline: Data Development for Advanced AI
description:
Sepal AI works with the world’s leading experts for developing advanced capability training data, expert annotations, and bespoke model evaluations. 

Our team comes from Turing, Vercel, McKinsey, and Bain. At Turing, we built the LLM training business and products to support $100+M revenue for companies like OpenAI, Google, and Anthropic.

We learned that data development for advanced AI use cases is more complex and has unique needs different from traditional label generation 

Foundational AI companies and large enterprises that we worked with, like OpenAI, PepsiCo, and Johnson &Johnson, don't have the data they need to train models to produce value for highly technical use cases. Which means they’re not going to unlock the value from AI without a partner.

We are working with the most influential companies of our time to develop models and systems that extend human knowledge and capabilities.

founders.name: Robi Lin, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder @ Sepal AI

Built the enterprise workflow products and fulfillment strategy at Turing.com. Scaled Turing’s LLM trainer business line from 50 to 800+ onboarded developers in 5 months for foundational LLM and enterprise customers. Previously was at Bain & Co.

founders.name: Kat Hu, Founder
founders.description:
Cofounder @ Sepal AI

Built Turing’s Foundational LLM trainer business GTM. Ran orgs of 500+ AI trainers & built corresponding operations for scale. Previously was at McKinsey.

founders.name: Fedor Paretsky, Founder
founders.description: I'm the co-founder and CTO at Sepal AI. Previously, I built platforms and infrastructure to bill users at Vercel while it went through hyper growth ($20M -> $100M ARR). Before that, I worked on FP&A software at Mosaic and on platforms and infra at Newfront.

generated_description:
**Sepal AI: Shaping the Future of Data Development for Advanced AI**

Founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Sepal AI is a San Francisco-based startup on a mission to redefine data development for advanced artificial intelligence. With an expert team sourced from notable companies like Turing, Vercel, McKinsey, and Bain, Sepal AI combines experience and innovation in the quest for high-quality AI training datasets.

### The Team's Credibility
At Turing, the team was instrumental in generating significant revenue for AI giants such as OpenAI, Google, and Anthropic. This experience helped them grasp the intricate needs surrounding data for advanced AI use cases, which diverge sharply from traditional labeling practices. They recognize that the foundational AI companies and large enterprises—like PepsiCo and Johnson & Johnson—often lack the essential data to train models effectively. In short, these companies need a partner like Sepal AI to unlock the true potential of AI.

### Services Offered
Sepal AI's offerings are broad and specialized:
- **Bespoke Evaluations & Expert Annotations**: Tailored assessments that leverage insights from over 20,000 PhDs and industry specialists to curate high-quality datasets.
- **Human Baselining**: Comprehensive benchmarks created through expert annotations, ensuring statistical significance and reliability.
- **Advanced AI Training**: Focused on Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback (RLHF) and supervised fine-tuning, catering specifically to advanced science and professional service applications.

### Quality Control
A hallmark of Sepal AI’s approach is their commitment to quality management. They prioritize:
- Custom-tailored datasets based on specific client requirements.
- Collaboration with dedicated operations for effective campaign management.
- Access to vetted experts across various fields—spanning biology, law, medicine, chemistry, mathematics, and engineering—all ensuring relevant expertise in data creation and labeling.

### Engaging with Sepal AI
They actively invite prospective clients to engage through free consultations, highlighting their readiness to partner with businesses at the cutting edge of AI development. Backed by Y Combinator, they are positioned to navigate the complexities of AI training data effectively, ultimately aiming to enhance human capabilities through technology.

For more on Sepal AI and to book a consultation, visit their website at [sepalai.com](https://www.sepalai.com).

**In Summary**: Sepal AI is more than just another data labeling service; it’s a partner for companies that want to harness the full power of AI. With their expertise, they're paving the way for better data, and consequently, better AI models.
